quoteText:
We may provide you with access to third-party tools over which we neither monitor nor have any control nor input.&nbsp.
You acknowledge and agree that we provide access to such tools "as is" and "as available" without any warranties, representations or conditions of any kind and without any endorsement.
title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

tosdr.case: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
tosdr.tldr: Not the 'as is' Case since it is limited to third parties (on this excerpt specifically).
